text: James Underwood Cross (April 25, 1925 â€“ July 11, 2015) was a United States Air Force brigadier general and author of Around the World with LBJ: My Wild Ride As Air Force One Pilot, White House Aide, and Personal Confidant, with Denise Gamino and Gary Rice. He was a military aide and chief Air Force One pilot under United States president Lyndon B. Johnson. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American military personnel of World War II] Category:Writers from Alabama Category:Military people from Alabama
title: James U. Cross
